name: Winding City of Distractions
description:
Overview

Explore a city landscape, discover new areas, go over obstacles, and collect 50 coins.

This city has been known to distract and impair the senses of the human body, leaving whoever enters vulnerable and lost inside this isolated area.  As you enter yourself, your only clue to getting out, are these random coins found across the city.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Ctr - Crouch

Info

DATT 3300 LAB 02

Student Name: Philip Kim

Game Design Document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1882maQtB42zkFbs_v4FPyUmIlVirsoWj_hr_AwTLpnE/..
